jcw_trace.name: Trace
jcw_trace.description: Use line and box traces to make your objects more aware of their surroundings.

obstacles.name: Obstacles
obstacles.desc: Choose whether solids obstruct traces or if to use custom objects added by events.

use-collision-cells.name: Use collision cells
use-collision-cells.desc: Usually improves performance, but can be slower over very long distances.

padding.name: Padding
padding.desc: Padding amount to insert between the hit object and the returned hit position. Clamped between 0 and 1.

hit0.description: Test if the last trace performed hit something.

addobstacle0.description: Add a custom object as an obstacle to traces.

obstacle0.name: Obstacle
obstacle0.desc: Choose an object to add as an obstacle, obstructing traces.

traceline2.description: Performs a line trace, storing the results.

start_x0.name: Start X
start_x0.desc: X coordinate of the start of the trace.

start_y1.name: Start Y
start_y1.desc: Y coordinate of the start of the trace.

end_x2.name: End X
end_x2.desc: X coordinate of the end of the trace.

end_y3.name: End Y
end_y3.desc: Y coordinate of the end of the trace.

hituÄ±d0.description: Gets the UID of the object hit by the last trace. Returns -1 if none.

hitx1.description: Gets the X coordinate of the first intersection.

hity2.description: Gets the Y coordinate of the first intersection.

normalangle3.description: Gets the perpendicular angle of the first intersecting line.

reflectangle4.description: Gets the new angle of the ray afting being reflected by the first intersecting line.

hitfrac5.description: Gets the fractional distance to where the hit occured, with the start point being 0, and the end point being 1.
